name: Burning Calories
description:
Every overweight person dreams of only one thing, to lose weight as soon as possible. Our hero believes in this so much that he even has such dreams. He runs from a huge bun and tries to survive. Replenish calories and run without stopping.

Burning Calories is a side view runner in which you have to run away from a huge bun. Food delivery men are running to meet you and huge hot dogs are lying around. Jump over them or shoot them with a pistol. By the end of the day, you will lose quite a few pounds!

Game Features:
- Increasing Difficulty
-Pixel Art
- Music
